Html:
What assumptions does the Tankadin model make?

My primary concern is what talent spec is being considered. With talents that increase Defense, armor, and stamina... I think it's important to know what is being covered.

There are also talents which increase Seal and Judgment of Justice damage and other spell damage which affect threat.  I have seen other classes with options to select talents.  Tankadin just needs a little more work.  I hope whoever is doing this work for us has time to complete it.
Yep, he's gunna be working on fixing it up and filling in the holes, soon.
